array.name: countries
array.item: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

string-array.name: filename_templates
string-array.item: %(uploader)s___(string): Full name of the video uploader)
%(playlist_index,playlist_autonumber&{}. |)s%(title)s___(string): Title with playlist index in front if its available
%(fulltitle)s___(string): Video title ignoring live timestamp and generic title)
%(alt_title)s___(string): A secondary title of the video)
%(display_id)s___(string): An alternative identifier for the video)
%(license)s___(string): License name the video is licensed under)
%(timestamp)s___(numeric): UNIX timestamp of the moment the video became available)
%(release_timestamp)s___(numeric): UNIX timestamp of the moment the video was released)
%(release_date)s___(string): The date (YYYYMMDD) when the video was released in UTC)
%(modified_timestamp)s___(numeric): UNIX timestamp of the moment the video was last modified)
%(modified_date)s___(string): The date (YYYYMMDD) when the video was last modified in UTC)
%(uploader_id)s___(string): Nickname or id of the video uploader)
%(channel)s___(string): Full name of the channel the video is uploaded on)
%(channel_is_verified)s___(boolean): Whether the channel is verified on the platform)
%(location)s___(string): Physical location where the video was filmed)
%(duration)s___(numeric): Length of the video in seconds)
%(view_count)s___(numeric): How many users have watched the video on the platform)
%(concurrent_view_count)s___(numeric): How many users are currently watching the video on the platform.)
%(like_count)s___(numeric): Number of positive ratings of the video)
%(dislike_count)s___(numeric): Number of negative ratings of the video)
%(repost_count)s___(numeric): Number of reposts of the video)
%(average_rating)s___(numeric): Average rating give by users, the scale used depends on the webpage)
%(comment_count)s___(numeric): Number of comments on the video (For some extractors, comments are only downloaded at the end, and so this field cannot be used))
%(live_status)s___(string): One of "not_live", "is_live", "is_upcoming", "was_live", "post_live" (was live, but VOD is not yet processed))
%(is_live)s___(boolean): Whether this video is a live stream or a fixed-length video)
%(was_live)s___(boolean): Whether this video was originally a live stream)
%(playable_in_embed)s___(string): Whether this video is allowed to play in embedded players on other sites)
%(start_time)s___(numeric): Time in seconds where the reproduction should start, as specified in the URL)
%(end_time)s___(numeric): Time in seconds where the reproduction should end, as specified in the URL)
%(epoch)s___(numeric): Unix epoch of when the information extraction was completed)
%(autonumber)s___(numeric): Number that will be increased with each download, starting at --autonumber-start, padded with leading zeros to 5 digits)
%(video_autonumber)s___(numeric): Number that will be increased with each video)
%(n_entries)s___(numeric): Total number of extracted items in the playlist)
%(playlist_id)s___(string): Identifier of the playlist that contains the video)
%(playlist_title)s___(string): Name of the playlist that contains the video)
%(playlist_count)s___(numeric): Total number of items in the playlist. May not be known if entire playlist is not extracted)
%(playlist_index)s___(numeric): Index of the video in the playlist padded with leading zeros according the final index)
%(playlist_autonumber)s___(numeric): Position of the video in the playlist download queue padded with leading zeros according to the total length of the playlist)
%(playlist_uploader)s___(string): Full name of the playlist uploader)
%(playlist_uploader_id)s___(string): Nickname or id of the playlist uploader)
%(webpage_url)s___(string): A URL to the video webpage which if given to yt-dlp should allow to get the same result again)
%(webpage_url_basename)s___(string): The basename of the webpage URL)
%(webpage_url_domain)s___(string): The domain of the webpage URL)
%(original_url)s___(string): The URL given by the user (or same as webpage_url for playlist entries))
%(chapter)s___(string): Name or title of the chapter the video belongs to)
%(chapter_number)s___(numeric): Number of the chapter the video belongs to)
%(chapter_id)s___(string): Id of the chapter the video belongs to)
%(series)s___(string): Title of the series or programme the video episode belongs to)
%(season)s___(string): Title of the season the video episode belongs to)
%(season_number)s___(numeric): Number of the season the video episode belongs to)
%(season_id)s___(string): Id of the season the video episode belongs to)
%(episode_number)s___(numeric): Number of the video episode within a season)
%(track_number)s___(numeric): Number of the track within an album or a disc)
%(album)s___(string): Title of the album the track belongs to)
%(album_artist)s___(string): List of all artists appeared on the album)
%(disc_number)s___(numeric): Number of the disc or other physical medium the track belongs to)
%(release_year)s___(numeric): Year (YYYY) when the album was released)
%(section_number)s___(numeric): Number of the chapter within the file)
%(section_start)s___(numeric): Start time of the chapter in seconds)
%(section_end)s___(numeric): End time of the chapter in seconds)
